footer.slogan: Hoang Sa & Truong Sa belong to Vietnam!
footer.description: UIT Film - Free high-quality online movie streaming with Vietsub, dubbing, and HD. Massive library of new movies, cinema releases, TV shows, and films from Vietnam, Korea, China, Thailand, Japan, the US, and Europe. Explore the best 4K online movie platform of 2024!

faq.q1: 1. What is UIT FILM and what are its highlights?
faq.a1: UIT FILM is a free movie-streaming website in Vietnam with HD and 4K content, no ads, smooth performance, a friendly interface, and frequent updates from many countries.
faq.a2: Yes. It's entirely free and you don't need to pay or register to watch.
faq.q3: 3. Does UIT FILM include theatrical releases?
faq.a3: Yes. UIT FILM features many hit theatrical films from Vietnam and abroad, updated quickly.
faq.q4: 4. How fast is streaming on UIT FILM?
faq.a4: Fast and stable thanks to modern servers, minimizing interruptions.
faq.q5: 5. Is the video quality on UIT FILM good?
faq.a5: Yes. From HD up to 4K for sharp and lifelike visuals.
faq.q6: 6. Which devices can I use to watch UIT FILM?
faq.a6: Desktop, mobile phones, and tablets are supported.
faq.q7: 7. Does UIT FILM support dubbing and subtitles?
faq.a7: Yes. Multiple dubbing options and multilingual subtitles are available.
faq.q8: 8. Are there ads while watching on UIT FILM?
faq.a8: No. Watching is seamless without ads.
faq.q9: 9. Which countries' films are available on UIT FILM?
faq.a9: Vietnam, Korea, China, Japan, Thailand, the US, Europe, and more.
faq.q10: 10. What are the most popular genres on UIT FILM?
faq.a10: Action, romance, sci-fi, historical, animation, horror, martial arts, drama.
faq.q11: 11. Does UIT FILM update new movies?
faq.a11: Yes. New titles are updated continuously so you won't miss the latest hits.
faq.q12: 12. Does UIT FILM offer both movies and TV shows?
faq.a12: Yes. It includes both feature films and multi-episode TV shows.
faq.q13: 13. Does UIT FILM support animated films?
faq.a13: Yes. A rich catalog of animation, including Japanese anime.
faq.q14: 14. Is it easy to search for films on UIT FILM?
faq.a14: Yes. The interface is optimized to search by title, genre, country, and categories.
faq.a15: Yes. It offers many 4K titles for a theater-like experience.
faq.q16: 16. Does UIT FILM support regional Vietnamese dubbing?
faq.a16: Yes. Northern, Central, and Southern Vietnamese dubbing options are available.
faq.q17: 17. Are there lists of most-watched titles on UIT FILM?
faq.a17: Yes. Frequently updated lists of most-watched titles, domestic and international.
faq.q18: 18. Why choose UIT FILM over other sites?
faq.a18: Free, ad-free, large HD/4K catalog, fast loading, and easy-to-use interface.
faq.q19: 19. Do I need an account to watch on UIT FILM?
faq.a19: No. You can watch freely without an account.
faq.q20: 20. Does UIT FILM protect user privacy?
faq.a20: Yes. No personal data is required and user data is not used for advertising.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Security - UIT FILM Privacy Policy
privacy.intro.p1: At UIT FILM, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information when you access and use our website. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data, and our commitment to transparency in managing personal information.
privacy.collect.heading: Information We Collect
privacy.collect.p1: To provide and improve our services, UIT FILM collects information from users in several ways, including:
privacy.collect.personal_text: When you register an account, subscribe to newsletters, or contact us, we may collect details such as your name, email address, phone number, and other information you provide.
privacy.purpose.heading: How We Use Information
privacy.purpose.service_text: Use information to deliver and maintain UIT FILM services, handle requests, and improve user experience.
privacy.purpose.comms_text: Send notices, newsletters, and updates related to our services. You can opt out at any time.
privacy.purpose.analytics_text: Use non-personal data to better understand user behavior and improve the website, products, and services.
privacy.purpose.security_text: Apply measures to protect the website and users from fraud, ensure data safety, and comply with legal requirements.
privacy.share.heading: Information Sharing
privacy.share.intro: UIT FILM does not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
privacy.share.consent_text: We only share personal information with your explicit consent.
privacy.share.partners_text: Share data with trusted partners and service providers to support service delivery, payment processing, and data analytics.
privacy.share.law_text: UIT FILM may disclose personal data when required by law or to protect the rights, property, and safety of the company and users.
privacy.security.heading: Personal Data Security
privacy.security.p1: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, and alteration. However, no transmission or storage method is completely secure. UIT FILM continuously improves its safeguards to protect your information.
privacy.rights.heading: Your Privacy Rights
privacy.rights.access: Access, correct, and delete your personal information that we hold. To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
privacy.rights.optout: Opt out of UIT FILM notifications at any time via email preferences or by contacting us directly.
privacy.cookies.heading: Cookies and Similar Technologies
privacy.cookies.p1: UIT FILM uses cookies and similar technologies to collect non-personal information about how you use the website. Cookies help us to:
privacy.cookies.remember: Improve user experience by remembering your preferences.
privacy.cookies.analyze: Analyze traffic and user behavior to improve the service.
privacy.cookies.ads: Provide relevant advertising based on your activity.
privacy.cookies.note: You can adjust cookie settings in your browser or disable cookies if you prefer.
privacy.change.heading: Changes to This Policy
privacy.change.p1: UIT FILM may update this Privacy Policy to reflect new regulations and internal policies. Any changes will be announced on the website and take effect upon posting. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
privacy.contact.heading: Contact
privacy.contact.p1: If you have any questions or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
terms.title: Terms
terms.heading: Terms of Service - UIT FILM
terms.intro.p1: Welcome to UIT FILM. By using our services, you agree to the terms below.
terms.accept.p1: By using UIT FILM, you confirm you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms. If not, stop using the service.
terms.register.p1: When registering an account on UIT FILM, you agree:
terms.register.li1: Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information.
terms.register.li2: Keep your credentials secure and are responsible for all activities under your account.
terms.register.li3: Do not use the account to violate laws or harm others.
terms.prohibited.li1: Upload content that violates IP rights, laws, or privacy.
terms.prohibited.li2: Tamper with systems or attempt unauthorized access.
terms.prohibited.li3: Use the platform for commercial purposes without written consent.
terms.privacy.p1: We protect personal data. See our
terms.privacy.p2: to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.
terms.serviceChange.p1: UIT FILM reserves the right to:
terms.serviceChange.li1: We may change, update, or discontinue content/services without prior notice.
terms.serviceChange.li2: We may remove or suspend accounts that violate these Terms or laws.
terms.disclaimer.li2: Third-party content or losses arising from using such content.
terms.disclaimer.li3: Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages from using or inability to use the service.
terms.changes.p1: These Terms may be updated. Continued use means you accept the new Terms.
about.title: About us
about.heading: UIT FILM - Free Online Movie Platform
about.intro.p1: UIT FILM is a free online movie platform focused on quality, convenience, and variety. Founded to deliver a fully free entertainment experience, UIT FILM has become a familiar destination for movie lovers.
about.ui.p1: UIT FILM features a minimal, friendly UI so you can explore and find favorites quickly. With a few steps, access our diverse library and enjoy content anytime, anywhere.
about.catalog.p1: We offer thousands of titles: action, romance, sci-fi, animation, horror, adventure. Frequently updated to keep you ahead of trends.
about.catalog.li.series: Series: from classics to the newest TV shows for continuous watching.
about.catalog.li.movies: Movies: blockbusters from Hollywood and Asia to engaging indies.
about.catalog.li.vn: Vietnamese films: updated with new and popular local titles.
about.quality.p1: Multiple resolutions from HD to 4K to match your connection and needs. Crisp visuals and vivid audio for theater-like experiences.
about.features.li.fast: Fast updates so you stay ahead.
about.commitment.p1: We protect user interests and continuously improve quality. Safety and privacy are top priorities; your personal data is protected.
about.contact.p1: For details or questions, contact us at
contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Contact
contact.intro.p1: Welcome to UIT FILM's Contact page. We are ready to support you for the best experience. For any questions, feedback, or support requests, reach us via the information below.
contact.supportEmail.label: Customer support email:
contact.main.li.account: Account issues: password reset, access problems, and account-related issues.
contact.main.li.tech: Technical support: playback issues, video quality, or other site problems.
contact.main.li.feedback: Feedback: we value your input to improve our service.
contact.privacy.note: For any questions about data security and privacy at UIT FILM.
contact.social.intro: You can also connect and get the latest updates from UIT FILM via:
contact.faq.p1: Before sending a request, please see the
contact.faq.p2: to quickly find answers to the most common issues at
contact.closing.p1: We are happy to help and want to deliver the best streaming experience!
contact.closing.brand: UIT FILM — Explore a diverse, safe, and free world of entertainment!
